statements: SELECT * FROM historical_data ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT year, month, expenses FROM historical_data WHERE expenses > 1000;
SELECT year, budget FROM historical_data WHERE year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020 ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE budget < 500 AND expenses < 300;
SELECT id, year, month FROM historical_data WHERE month IN (4, 7, 10) ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE year = 2021 AND month = 5
SELECT id, year, expenses FROM historical_data WHERE year > 2019 ORDER BY year DESC, expenses ASC
SELECT id, SUM(budget) AS total_budget FROM historical_data GROUP BY id HAVING total_budget > 5000
SELECT AVG(expenses) AS avg_expenses FROM historical_data WHERE year = 2021 AND month < 6
SELECT * FROM historical_data ORDER BY month, budget DESC
SELECT * FROM budget_planning;
SELECT year, budget FROM budget_planning WHERE expenses > 5000;
SELECT year, revenue FROM financial_analysis WHERE profit > 10000 ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT id, year, profit FROM financial_analysis WHERE year = 2022;
SELECT * FROM budget_planning JOIN financial_analysis ON budget_planning.year = financial_analysis.year;
SELECT * FROM budget_planning WHERE year = 2022 ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT id, year, budget, expenses FROM budget_planning WHERE budget > 10000 AND expenses < 5000;
SELECT year, SUM(budget) AS total_budget FROM budget_planning GROUP BY year HAVING total_budget > 50000;
SELECT year, profit, revenue FROM financial_analysis WHERE profit > revenue;
SELECT * FROM budget_planning WHERE expenses > budget ORDER BY year ASC, budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM Budget_Plans;
SELECT plan_id, plan_name, start_date, end_date FROM Budget_Plans WHERE total_budget > 5000;
SELECT expense_id, amount, category, expense_date FROM Expenses ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT plan_id, COALESCE(projected_savings, 0) AS projected_savings, actual_savings FROM Financial_Analysis WHERE plan_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT plan_id, COUNT(analysis_id) AS num_analyses FROM Financial_Analysis GROUP BY plan_id HAVING num_analyses > 2;
SELECT * FROM Budget_Plans WHERE total_budget > 10000 ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC;
SELECT analysis_date, projected_savings FROM Financial_Analysis WHERE plan_id = 'c2c6f070-85c0-4f84-a8d4-bba5969c4533' ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT plan_name, start_date, end_date, total_budget FROM Budget_Plans WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT plan_id, SUM(amount) AS total_expenses FROM Expenses WHERE category = 'Utilities' GROUP BY plan_id ORDER BY total_expenses DESC;

SELECT Expenses.plan_id, Budget_Plans.plan_name, Expenses.expense_date, Expenses.amount FROM Expenses INNER JOIN Budget_Plans ON Expenses.plan_id = Budget_Plans.plan_id WHERE Budget_Plans.total_budget > 50000 ORDER BY Expenses.amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Budgets WHERE year = 2021;
SELECT budget_id, amount FROM Budgets WHERE year > 2020 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT category, amount FROM Expenditures WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT * FROM Revenue WHERE year BETWEEN 2019 AND 2022;
SELECT report_id, description FROM Reports WHERE year = 2020;
SELECT * FROM Budgets WHERE year = 2022 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT expenditure_id, category FROM Expenditures WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY expenditure_id ASC;
SELECT r.year, r.amount, b.amount FROM Revenue r JOIN Budgets b ON r.year = b.year WHERE r.year = 2023 ORDER BY b.amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Expenditures WHERE category = 'Office Supplies' OR category = 'Travel' ORDER BY expenditure_id ASC;
SELECT report_id, year, description FROM Reports WHERE year < 2021 ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT * FROM BudgetPlans;
SELECT budget_amount, year FROM BudgetPlans WHERE id = 1;
SELECT category_name, category_description FROM BudgetCategories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT id, expense_category FROM Expenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000;
SELECT budget_plan_id, analysis_date, analysis_result FROM FinancialAnalysis WHERE id <= 5;
SELECT * FROM BudgetPlans WHERE year = 2022;
SELECT id, budget_amount FROM BudgetPlans WHERE budget_amount > 5000 ORDER BY budget_amount DESC;
SELECT BudgetPlans.id, Expenses.expense_category, Expenses.expense_amount FROM BudgetPlans JOIN Expenses ON BudgetPlans.id = Expenses.budget_plan_id WHERE Expenses.expense_amount < 1000;
SELECT BudgetPlans.id, BudgetPlans.year, SUM(Expenses.expense_amount) AS total_expense FROM BudgetPlans JOIN Expenses ON BudgetPlans.id = Expenses.budget_plan_id GROUP BY BudgetPlans.id;

SELECT FinancialAnalysis.id, BudgetCategories.category_name, FinancialAnalysis.analysis_result FROM FinancialAnalysis JOIN BudgetCategories ON FinancialAnalysis.budget_plan_id = BudgetCategories.id WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
